Testimonials.Testimonial: Mihlali is a highly thought intellectual from my perspective. He is passionate, ambitious, hardworking and always provides a helping hand to anyone who needs it. He has a great positive attitude and fantastic communication and leadership skills and any company would be lucky to have him on their team.
I have had the pleasure of working with many people, but you truly stand out as one of the best. Your dedication to your work is unparalleled, and your passion for achieving your goals is inspiring.

Great guy, focused individual that knows what he wants, when he sets his mind to something, to a project, he sticks to that the he has planned out. Great team player, always assisting his peers but also keeping up with his own work.

Mihlali is a hardworking person , who finds ways to improve his craft through perseverance. He is strong when it comes to solving and providing solutions to problems we may have in a group environment. Asking thought provoking questions that lead to him improving at an alarming rate at this institution, great leader.

Mihlali's talent is undeniable. They have a natural ability to excel in their chosen field and consistently produce outstanding work.What sets Mihlali apart is their unwavering dedication and passion for their craft. They approach every project with enthusiasm and a relentless pursuit of excellence.

Mihlali is a very determined being, always focused and wanting to get things done on time. Mihlali is very good when working alone and even better when he is put into a group. He is always trying to upskill his self by asking questions or learning from his peers.

Volunteer.expirience: In the year 2019, I had the privilege of engaging in voluntary service at the aquarium, where I dedicated my efforts both in the front of house, actively engaging with visitors, and behind the scenes.

I enthusiastically volunteered my time to work in a garden, actively contributing to its cultivation and maintenance. I dedicated myself to tasks such as planting, weeding, and nurturing the garden's vitality.

Education.schooling: In the year 2022, I successfully completed my secondary education, attaining a bachelor's pass as a testament to my academic accomplishments. With the acquisition of a bachelor's pass, I am now embarking on the next chapter of my educational and professional pursuits.

In 2019, I had the privilege of attending a Young Biologist course at the aquarium, where I achieved a distinguished Diamond Certificate. This esteemed recognition symbolizes my exceptional performance and proficiency in the study of biology.

As of 2023, I am actively enrolled in the Life Choices Coding Academy, where I am diligently pursuing comprehensive training in web development. Through this esteemed program, I am equipped with the necessary skills, knowledge, and practical experience to excel in this dynamic field.
